hero.label: Hero Sections
hero.description: Above-the-fold intros that mix bold headlines, supporting copy, CTAs, and immersive visuals.

variants.name: Split Layout
variants.layout: Two-column grid with copy on the left and layered imagery/device mockups on the right.
variants.visual_notes: Use gradient accent behind the image, add floating stat cards, keep copy width ~560px.

variants.name: Centered Spotlight
variants.layout: Full-width hero with centered text stack and floating product card carousel.
variants.visual_notes: Apply glassmorphism card for gallery, fade background with radial gradient, use subtle motion cues.

variants.name: Story Panel
variants.layout: Text column with conversational copy + stacked proof bars next to vertical imagery strip.
variants.visual_notes: Use serif headline + sans body, include vertical accent line, add subtle texture background.

testimonials.label: Testimonials
testimonials.description: Social proof layouts to build trust.

variants.name: Card Grid
variants.layout: Responsive grid of testimonial cards with star ratings and avatar row.
variants.visual_notes: Alternate background tints, include quotation marks, highlight featured quote with accent border.

variants.name: Carousel
variants.layout: Full-width slider with one expanded quote and thumbnail navigation.
variants.visual_notes: Use faux slider controls, add gradient halo behind avatar, animate transitions subtly.

variants.name: Timeline Praise
variants.layout: Vertical timeline where each milestone includes client praise.
variants.visual_notes: Use timeline dots/glow, connect lines with gradient stroke, pair with KPI chips.

variants.name: Three Tiers
variants.layout: Three-column cards with middle plan elevated and badge.
variants.visual_notes: Scale featured card, add badge chip, include toggle for monthly/annual CTA stub.

variants.name: Comparison Table
variants.layout: Table layout with features on rows and plans as columns.
variants.visual_notes: Sticky plan labels, zebra striping, highlight differences with icons.

variants.name: Card Split
variants.layout: Two cards (Starter vs Pro) with detailed perks and testimonial snippet.
variants.visual_notes: Use diagonal gradient divider, include mini quote, animate hover lift.

timeline.label: Timeline / Process
timeline.description: Steps or milestones to explain journey or roadmap.

variants.name: Horizontal Steps
variants.layout: Row of numbered steps with icons and short description.
variants.visual_notes: Connect with gradient line, use circular icons, highlight current step.

variants.name: Vertical Cards
variants.layout: Stacked cards along a vertical line with alternating alignment.
variants.visual_notes: Alternate left/right alignment, add soft shadows, include connectors.

variants.name: Featured Milestones
variants.layout: Minimal timeline with large numerals and supporting media thumbnails.
variants.visual_notes: Use oversized typography, embed media chip (image/vid), fade connectors.
